name: Fly or Dive
description:
Fly or Dive is new puzzle game designed by Tetris creator – Alexey Pajitnov.

• Original game mechanics;
• Funny graphics and sounds;
• Simple puzzle rules.

Build a route for your hot air balloon between dangerous clouds and trees:
• Drag sets from bottom pool onto vacant space of the playing field;
• Form full rectangles of elements to direct your balloon to top or bottom;
• Fly the whole journey around the globe.
